AuthorizationForm.name: AuthorizationForm
AuthorizationForm.description: Represents the specific version and effective dates of a form that is associated with consent, such as a privacy policy or terms and conditions.

DefaultAuthFormTextId.description: Required. The ID of the default authorization form text to use if text isn’t available for a specific language.

EffectiveFromDate.description: The date when the authorization form takes effect.

EffectiveToDate.description: The date when the authorization form is no longer in effect.

IsSignatureRequired.description: Indicates whether the authorization form requires a signature.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, it’s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Required. The name of the authorization form.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the owner of the account associated with this customer.

RevisionNumber.description: The revision number of the authorization form. For example, "rev1.21."
